summary.span: 是一種可變動的參考型別 (Reference Type)，它會包裝 陣列或 執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以取得`varchar`， `nvarchar`， `char`， `nchar`， `text`，和`ntext`值，或您可以建立透過 unmanaged 緩衝區。 can be obtained for `varchar`, `nvarchar`, `char`, `nchar`, `text`, and `ntext` values, or can be created over an unmanaged buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public long Read (long offset, char[] buffer, int offsetInBuffer, int count);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 Read(int64 offset, char[] buffer, int32 offsetInBuffer, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function Read (offset As Long, buffer As Char(), offsetInBuffer As Integer, count As Integer) As Long
public: long Read(long offset, cli::array <char> ^ buffer, int offsetInBuffer, int count);
member this.Read : int64 * char[] * int * int -> int64

param.name: offset
param.span: 值，會位移至包含在 執行個體中的值。

span.span: An value offset into the value that is contained in the instance.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要複製的目標字元陣列緩衝區。

span.span: The character array buffer to copy into.

param.name: offsetInBuffer
param.span: 緩衝區中要開始進行資料複製的 整數位移。

span.span: An integer offset into the buffer to start copying into.

param.name: count
param.span: 整數值，表示要複製的字元數目。

span.span: An integer value representing the number of characters to copy.

summary.span: 將字元從這個 執行個體複製到傳入緩衝區，並傳回複製字元的數目。

span.span: Copies characters from this instance to the passed-in buffer and returns the number of copied characters.

returns.span: 值，表示複製的位元組數目。

span.span: An value representing the number of copied bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果嘗試讀取超過，會擲回例外狀況。If an attempt is made to read beyond , an exception is thrown. 如果`count`指定要比都是從複製的更多字元`offsetInBuffer`複製值的結尾，只有可用的字元。If `count` specifies more characters to be copied than are available from the `offsetInBuffer` to the end of the value, only the available characters are copied. 如果目的地緩衝區為 null 參考，則會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if the destination buffer is a null reference. 如果目的緩衝區無法接收要求的字元越多，則會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if the destination buffer cannot receive as many characters as requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此作業會寫入到超過但內，會更新以反映新的結束位置。If this operation writes to a position beyond but within , is updated to reflect the new ending position. 值`offsetInBuffer`必須是小於或等於。The value of `offsetInBuffer` must be less than or equal to . 否則會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown otherwise. 寫入 null 值的執行個體時，可以指定值為 0。Only a value of 0 can be specified when writing to a null value instance. 如果嘗試寫入超過，會擲回例外狀況。If an attempt is made to write beyond , an exception is thrown.
